elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Your supervisor wants various information from you about the applications - work with the data section to do this.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: How many registrations per course have already been received?
elements.correctAnswer: Computer science basics (8), photo editing (6), web publishing (5).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: How many women have registered for the "Computer Science Basics" course?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Are there more men than women on the web publishing course?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: You and your bank neighbor also register for a course (select and complete your details).

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Your manager tells you that a course will only cover its costs or start at all if there are eight participants. Which courses can be started immediately?
elements.correctAnswer: Solution depends on the two new course registrations. The basic computer science course can start in any case, possibly photo editing.
